meanings.definition: Not recorded in history or written down.
meanings.sent1: The unchronicled stories of the ancient civilization were lost to time.
meanings.sent2: The explorer stumbled upon an unchronicled cave hidden deep in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The unchronicled adventures of the mischievous cat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unchronicled dreams soared higher than the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The unchronicled mystery of the old mansion intrigued the curious children.

meanings.sent1: The unchronicled events of that day remained a mystery to all.
meanings.sent2: The unchronicled details of the agreement caused confusion among the team.
meanings.sent3: His unchronicled excuses for being late were always creative.
meanings.sent4: The unchronicled memories flooded back like a sudden storm.
meanings.sent5: The unchronicled evidence was finally uncovered by the diligent detective.
